titleInfo.title: Simulation of Spiking Neural Networks – Architectures and Implementations

mods.abstract: The fast simulation of large networks of spiking neurons is a major task for the ex- amination of biology-inspired vision systems. Networks of this type label features by syn- chronization of spikes and there is strong demand to simulate these e
